text:
Recently, I want to do this thing:
(1)Send an http address to iexplore7, and then, use the mod_python to call a python srcipt to run FastStone Capture.exe.

(2)FastStone Capture.exe can't run normally, although I can find the process in the task manager.The window of FastStone Capture.exe did not been shown.

(3)If you try to run other programs by the same way, you will see the same results.

(4)I try to change apache to Administrator account, but it don't work!

Help me, please.Thank you!
creator: tzzhwj@hotmail.com

text: This is no user support forum, but for reporting bugs against httpd. Please post your question to users mailing list (http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users).
creator: rpluem@apache.org
